text: Radio Nacional del Paraguay it is the radio station governmental broadcaster of the Paraguay. Founded in the 1940s, it ceased broadcasting in 2005. ShortwaveDa Estação de Rádio Oficial para a Estação de rádio pública. Editorial, Radio Nacional del Paraguay, 4 de outubro de 2009. Em espanhol.. and currently, it reaches its international audience exclusively through the Internet. Locally it is broadcast on Medium wave, on the frequency of 920 kHz. The programs are in Spanish and in guarani language. ==References== == Other websites == * Radio Nacional del Paraguay at www.radionacionaldelparaguay.com.py * SICOM homepage at www.sicom.gov.py Category:Radio stations Category:1940s establishments
title: Radio Nacional del Paraguay
